short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Signs you in to into SmoothWall because it times out. Warning: ls.zebras.net SmoothWall server only!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension makes the crap SmoothWall experience just a tad better. SmoothWall signs you out automatically way too often. This extension will try and keep you constantly signed into SmoothWall using its localstorage.
